hero.quote_desc: We project symbols of resistance onto global diplomatic landmarks, challenging totalitarian narratives through light and public space.

purpose.subtitle: Our Strategic Roadmap

1.title: 100 Coordinates
1.desc: Establish a presence at 100 strategic landmarks worldwide. Each projection serves as a visual beacon, breaking the silence and connecting the global resistance.

2.title: Decentralized Network
2.desc: Deploy 1,000+ encrypted projection kits to activists globally. Transition from centralized actions to a self-sustaining, untraceable movement of light.

3.title: Democratic China
3.desc: The dismantling of totalitarian structures. We visualize freedom until our light becomes the reality of a constitutional, democratic China.

purpose.footer_quote: History is written by those who act.
